MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML2 postcode area of Wishaw. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:48am following reports of a safety concern on our underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:10pm on the 11th of December 2020.
